name: KaibanJS (kaiban-ai)
description: [项目级] KaibanJS is a JavaScript-native framework for building and managing multi-agent systems  with a Kanban-inspired approach.。来源: https://github.com/kaiban-ai/KaibanJS

genes.title: 项目概述
genes.content:
KaibanJS is a JavaScript-native framework for building and managing multi-agent systems  with a Kanban-inspired approach.

来源: https://github.com/kaiban-ai/KaibanJS
语言: TypeScript
Stars: 1345

genes.title: 安装与快速开始
genes.content:
Get started with KaibanJS in under a minute:

[![Quick Start Video](https://res.cloudinary.com/dnno8pxyy/image/upload/v1728039764/KaibanJS_QuickStart_Guide_2_asuyvu.jpg)](https://youtu.be/NFpqFEl-URY?si=_JCkJuprRxqD0Uo 'Quick Start Video')

genes.title: 核心特性
genes.content: The Kaiban Board Kanban boards are excellent tools for showcasing team workflows in real time, providing a clear and interactive snapshot of each member's progress. > We've adapted this concept for AI agents. Now, you can visualize the workflow of your AI agents as team members, with tasks moving from "To Do" to "Done" right before your eyes. This visual representation simplifies understanding and managing complex AI operations, making it accessible to anyone, anywhere.
